awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 11 nominations.

fullplot: Salesman Willy Loman is in a crisis. He's about to lose his job, he can't pay his bills, and his sons Biff and Happy don't respect him and can't seem to live up to their potential. He wonders what went wrong and how he can make things up to his family.
plot: An aging traveling salesman recognizes the emptiness of his life and tries to fix it.
title: Death of a Salesman
